Improvements.Improvement: Extract inline class creation to a separate private method
Improvements.Description: The creation of new instances of `ColumnMeta` and `DimensionFormula` is done inline and makes the method larger and hard to read. The creation of these instances should be moved to private methods.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract conditional expressions into separate methods
Improvements.Description: The current method is quite large and contains a lot of logic. The conditional creation of `ReadPermission`, `Enumerated` and `Temporal` annotations can be extracted into separate private methods to improve readability.
